The '''Sprayground ''Minecraft'' collection''' is a [[merchandise]] collaboration between [[Mojang Studios]] and Sprayground,<ref>{{tweet|minecraft|1816142303662096563|HEY, OVERWORLD!!! We got your back(packs)! Minecraft and Sprayground have teamed up to craft the most mob'ulous lineup of backpacks to ever hit the block. Will you pick the Creeper Shark, the Ultimate Creative Mode Backpack, the Ender Dragon Attack, or the Creeper Moneybear? ðŸŽ’ aka.ms/MinecraftSpray...|July 24, 2024}}</ref> a backpack company, featuring four ''[[Minecraft]]''-themed backpacks. The collection was announced on July 24, 2024.
